replies.bodyText: Additionally: if the result format is not the default, please add a small help text on how to produce, like here: https://github.com/jenkinsci/warnings-ng-plugin/blob/master/src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/warnings/Detekt.java#L57
